title: Practical Language Proficiency Enhancement Course Through Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic workplace language expressions and document drafting competencies
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing language application skills reflecting real workplace scenarios to enhance job efficiency for working professionals. Asynchronous learning is supported via digital devices (laptops/tablets).

learning_goals: Systematically analyze language problems occurring in real-world work scenarios and propose solutions
Enhance practical document writing and presentation skills through team-based collaborative assignments
Over 90% of participants can apply language skills acquired through PBL activities to real-world tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
